Project.name: Pipes Utility for Haxe
Project.Description: This utility provides the capability for creating pipelines that pass messages between Cores in a PureMVC Haxe MultiCore-based application. Pipelines can contain filters, queues, splitting and merging tees, and more.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * A port of the Pipes Utility for ActionScript 3 * Enables modular communications between cores in PureMVC MultiCore.
Project.Installation: Prerequisites * You must have Haxe installed. * You must have PureMVC Haxe Standard or MultiCore installed. Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a Pipes_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\Pipes_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
